revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #37 Passho |image = [[File:Passho.png]] |caption = This Berry's flesh is dotted with countless tiny bubbles of air that keep it afloat in water. This Berry promotes the fruiting of nearby Berry plants. |growtime =6h 0m 0s |harvest = 22 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,300 |flavor =
*0 spicy *15 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Passho''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Oran]], at least 1 [[Chesto]], at least 1 [[Kelpsy]] and at least 1 [[Coba]]. When a Passho berry is not surrounded by at least one other berry, there is a chance it may mutate to a [[Yache]]. On obtaining your first Passho berry, plant a berry ([[Kasib]] is a good choice) around it to avoid it unintentionally mutating and then needing to reobtain it. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 8 mins 10 secs || 1 hour || 3 hours || 6 hours - 12 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PasshoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PasshoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PasshoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (harvest amount) | ||
x1.1 ||
x1.2 ||
x1.3 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 6 hours -
12 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 4 hours -
8 hours || 48 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 40 mins -
5 hours 20 mins || 32 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Passho berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Oran.png|30px]]

No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Coba]] || - || - || - |- | [[Kelpsy]] || 1 hour 40 secs until ripe || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs until ripe || 44 mins 27 secs until ripe |- | [[Oran]] || 5 mins until ripe || 3 mins 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Chesto]] || 40 secs until ripe || 27 secs until ripe || Not Practical |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Passho_Flow_Chart_Updated.png|500px]] {{Berries}}
